text: Jesse Eden Metcalfe (born December 9, 1978) is an American actor. He was born in Carmel Valley Village, California. Metcalfe is mostly known for his role as John Rowland in the series Desperate Housewives. Metcalfe has also had roles on the soap opera Passions and in the movie John Tucker Must Die. He played Christopher Ewing in the continuation of Dallas based on the 1978 series of the same name. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Monterey County, California Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:People from Monterey County, California
title: Jesse Metcalfe
